org.eclipse.gef4.mvc.fx.policies

Class FXResizeConnectionPolicy

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.gef4.mvc.policies.AbstractPolicy<VR>
      • org.eclipse.gef4.mvc.policies.AbstractTransactionPolicy<VR>
        • org.eclipse.gef4.mvc.policies.AbstractResizePolicy<javafx.scene.Node>
          • org.eclipse.gef4.mvc.fx.policies.FXResizePolicy
            • org.eclipse.gef4.mvc.fx.policies.FXResizeConnectionPolicy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAdaptable.Bound<IVisualPart<javafx.scene.Node,? extends javafx.scene.Node>>, IPolicy<javafx.scene.Node>

    public class FXResizeConnectionPolicy
extends FXResizePolicy
    The FXResizeConnectionPolicy is a specialization of the FXResizePolicy that performs a resize of an Connection visual by proportionally relocating its bend points.

    • Property Summary

      • Properties inherited from class org.eclipse.gef4.mvc.policies.AbstractPolicy

      • createOperation

        protected ITransactionalOperation createOperation()
        Description copied from class: AbstractTransactionPolicy
        Creates an ITransactionalOperation that is used to encapsulate the changes that are applied by this AbstractTransactionPolicy through its "work" methods. The created operation should allow for local execution at each time.
        Overrides:
        createOperation in class FXResizePolicy
        Returns:
        A new ITransactionalOperation to encapsulate all applied changes.

      • getIndicesOfMovableAnchors

        protected java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getIndicesOfMovableAnchors()
        Returns the indices of all movable anchors. Only those anchors are relocated by this policy.
        Returns:
        List of Integers specifying the anchors to relocate.

      • init

        public void init()
        Description copied from class: AbstractTransactionPolicy
        Initializes the policy, so that the policy's "work" methods can be used. Calling a "work" method while the policy is not initialized will result in an IllegalStateException, as well as re-initializing before committing or rolling back.
        Overrides:
        init in class AbstractResizePolicy<javafx.scene.Node>

      • isContentResizable

        protected boolean isContentResizable()
        Description copied from class: AbstractResizePolicy
        Returns whether the content part supports a content resize operation.
        Overrides:
        isContentResizable in class AbstractResizePolicy<javafx.scene.Node>
        Returns:
        true if content resize is supported, false otherwise.

        Description copied from class: AbstractResizePolicy
        Update the resize operation to the new final dh and dw values.
        Overrides:

        Parameters:

        dh - The new final height delta.
